title: League won't start
body:
So I go to click on the games shortcut on my desktop, but it comes up with this error saying, and I quote 

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\yaml.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020" 

end quote

I have no idea what is going on, the game is already installed so I don't want to start messing with reinstalling until I'm more sure what the problem is, does anyone else have/had this problem, or are able to help, because this is really starting to get on my nerves now

thanks

replies.body: Oof I stumbled across this problem but just look at Riot Broporos post and it should be all good! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

i am having the same problem i havent played league in about 3 days but ive been playing since about 2013 maybe before. ive deleted the new client image and did the suggestion but the same error keeps popping up. someone please help fix never had this problem. also trying hextech wont work hence it keeps crashing on dns server change
If you come back, cool, but I gotta go to sleep. I have a stupid sleep cycle, I know, but I'm tired af. See you tomorrow :P
You there Broporo? Hate to rush, but I'm wondering if you left.
I followed the advice, I did, but it didn't work.

Oh no.

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.97\deploy\Iibssl-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020."
I made a ticket a few minutes ago by the way, in case that's notable. Anyways, is that in Windows 10? The file explorer app doesn't look like that for me...

I just got this game and I installed it, went through the super long download of the client, then the game, etc. After all that wait, I get that type of message, except from other programs from LoL. I wish I could play this seemingly awesome game, but the game has denied me that.

Sorry that you've had such a rough time trying to get the game running for the first time DX! Pretty bad first impression if I say so myself!

No worries, follow the steps in this image I'm linking and you should be able to get the client properly working. Let me know in a reply if you're still having problems though!!

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

More than likely those dll error messages are trying to let you know that the client itself didn't get installed correctly for some weird reason. Run through the steps in the image I'm linking below, and that should be able to get things working normally again. 

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

Ok, had a look at the image and read what you sent

I've been playing League for YEARS now, I've been playing up until about two months ago so I've been playing with the new client too and all was fine, smooth sailing all the way

Now for some reason when I go to launch the game, it keeps giving me that error message

so here's my question

if the client didn't get installed correctly, why is this happening NOW after years with the old client, and now months with the new one?

and for the record, I didn't install the Alpha or beta version of the new client, I stuck with the old one until the new client went live and everyone's client updated to the new one, and like I said, smooth sailing for months, so what's happened?

I appreciate, your help and you sending me this, but I'm not entirely sure the client is to blame when it's been working fine before, I'm all confused and just want to play League again and it's frustrating seeing this message pop up, especially if I'm not the only one this has happened too

if this is a problem with the client, happening to multiple people, shouldn't Riot be fixing it?

Again, thank you for the info, I'll keep it in mind and if nothing else comes forward I'll give it a go, but I don't want to wreck anything that might be working properly until I know for sure what the problem 

Edit: Ok, didn't realize you were a player support specialist, sorry bout that, I'll give your suggestion a go and get back to you if it doesn't work, again sorry bout that
Also just tried repairing it; no luck.

Update: I figured I should post the 3 error messages I get and when exactly they occur. The bug happens right after I click "Launch" when starting the app up. It starts, but nothing else. Here's the messages:

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020." This has an error title of, "LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image"

Next:

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\zlib.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020." This has an error title of, "LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image"

Finally:

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcrypto-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020." This has an error title of, "LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image"

I had to copy and paste the error messages, that's why they are all almost the same. I'm not typing out all 3 of them without copy and paste.
